CustomField.description: This is the "Template Unique Name" of a classic email template that will be sent to the customer when the workbook is sent. This will default to the UDC default of "AH_UDC_Workbook_Sent_Template".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the "Template Unique Name" of a classic email template that will be sent to the customer when the workbook is sent. This will default to the UDC default of "AH_UDC_Workbook_Sent_Template".
CustomField.label: Email Template
